content:
I am getting FHIR context like that in a sample spring boot application I created :

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;
import ca.uhn.fhir.context.FhirContext;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;

@RestController
public class HelloController{

        @RequestMapping("/")
    public String index() {
        FhirContext ctx = FhirContext.forDstu3();
        return "Greetings from Spring Boot!";
    }
}

I am getting below error when i launch my application using http://localhost:8080

java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.IVersionSpecificBundleFactory
